statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 1 , -x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + x - 5 , -6 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + x + 5 , 2 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
